item.title: Constant dumping ground, 5th October
item.description:

item.title: Dumped Rubbish, 5th October
item.description:
Festering pile of rubbish at the bottom of the steps leading to Welling station. Lazy people leaving empty take away boxes, plastic bottles and other items here for someone else to clean up - the area will be infested with rats if this is not dealt with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Approach, Welling, London

item.title: Grafton road next to better leisure, 5th October
item.description:
This pothole the brick laid part of road on traffic light has come off as i turned into left turn prince of wales road. the brick dragged with my bike lifted my rear to be in the air and swang me 180 in the air causing me to drop on my back as im trying to control with bike with one leg. bike landed on me while i hurt my spine my left leg and my neck. this problem has caused my bike to me damaged and i wont pay for this. since this is not my fault. the pictures are traffic wardens and they told me to report this asap. you can get in touch with witnesses they will tell you the truth it has caused scratches and damages on my bike which was a clean bike for a 2015 and a one owner bike before me. my little brother has emailed and complained on my behalf yet no one wanted to help. this is camden councils fault for not fixing it even the traffic wardens told me this has been a problem. i can prove new pictures of my bike if needed please email or contact soon as possible as this is not fair and if it was a someone from camden council who had this same accident they would sort out the problem asap. the accident has left me in a lot of pain and i still had to go to work. my plate number on AU15TNK. red yamaha Nmax.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grafton Road, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo, 5th October

item.title: Road sign not facing the road, 5th October
item.description:
The road sign opposite my house is not facing the road to give information. It has turned to face houses. Needs to be turned to road to show new layout ahead. Very dangerous not to be on correct display.

item.title: Antisocial Behaviour 60 Upper Berkeley Street, 5th October
item.description:
Please investigate this report! This new tenant at 60 Upper Berkeley Street is leaving their trash in front of other neighbours doors every single night. It seems to be a large household so their trash is considerably also large. They drop the bin bags across the street, in front of the chaeropractor or a few doors down to the curve. This has been happening since they moved in 3 or 4 months ago. Please take this seriously and investigate it in any way you wish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Upper Berkeley Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Koffi Pot owner is throwing all the extra waste behind the shop near Residence stair, 5th October
item.description:
Koffi Pot guys is rude and I persoanlly show him throwing all thd waste which was behind the shop to residenace staircase. When I asked why he is doing it he said it is not mine and started arguing with me. Because of him my kid were about to fall while going to school. Also, I have 2.5 years tolder and he cannot go from thr stairs due to waste. Koffi Pot cafe bins are always full and to avoid extra payment for bin collection he takes out tbe bin and keep it aside. Need to fix this issue immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken lock on bin not fixed., 5th October
